tasks.command: open -a Simulator && xcrun simctl boot EF2D2DBE-AAC5-4BE9-BE97-9697704ECB8E 2>/dev/null || true && until xcrun simctl list devices | grep 'EF2D2DBE-AAC5-4BE9-BE97-9697704ECB8E' | grep 'Booted' > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done && flutter run
